title: imupsam
description: Upsamples a 2D image by a specified factor

ascii_flag.title: ASCII output flag
ascii_flag.description: Write the result in ASCII format: all numbers for the file are output, with no header info

factor.title: Upsampling factor
factor.description: Upsampling factor; must be an integer in the range 2 to 30

input_image.title: Input image file
input_image.description: Path of the input 2D image file

output_image.title: Output image file
output_image.description: Path of the output upsampled image file. Use '-' to write to stdout.
